downloadTitle: ARM Template to deploy multiple SQL VM and set up Always On
downloadDescription: This ARM template creates multiple SQL virtual machines on Azure with new or existing virtual network and it can also be used to  create Always On availability groups on SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines.

downloadFile.name: ARM Template to deploy multiple SQL VM and set up Always On.zip
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/e/3/e/e3ec84bd-fc8c-47da-8f56-822c63ce2158/ARM Template to deploy multiple SQL VM and set up Always On.zip

detailsSection:
This ARM template creates multiple SQL virtual machines on Azure with new or existing virtual network. It also creates network security group, network interfaces and publics IPs and availability set for the VMs. And finally, it creates an internal load balancer. 
This template can be used independently however, you can use this template along with other available templates for creating Always On availability groups on SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines.
detailsSection_file_name: ARM Template to deploy multiple SQL VM and set up Always On.zip
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a zipped folder that contains ARM Template to deploy multiple SQL VM and set up Always On and associated documentation.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do the following:
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
